contentrichtext.text: '''CPP''' and '''cpp''' may refer to: {{TOCRight}} == Advertising == * [[Cost per mille#Cost per Point (CPP) or Cost per Rating Point (CPR or CPRP)|Cost per point]], the cost of an advertising campaign, relative to the rating points delivered ==Companies== * [[Cleveland Public Power]], an electricity generation and distribution company in Ohio * [[CPP Group]], a British company selling life assistance products ==Education== * [[Cal Poly Pomona]], a four year university part of the 23 member California State University system. ==Political parties and organizations== * [[Centre for Policy Research]], India's premier public policy think tank and research institution * [[Cambodian People's Party]], the current ruling party of Cambodia * [[Communist Party of Pakistan]], a communist political party in Pakistan * [[Communist Party of the Philippines]], the leading communist party in the Philippines * [[Convention People's Party]], a socialist political party in Ghana * [[Patriotic Pan-African Convergence]], a political party in Togo * [[Centre for Public Policy]], a leading Indian policy think tank undertaken by the IIMB ==Science, technology and machinery== * [[C preprocessor]], a program that processes the C programming language before it is compiled * [[C++]] (common <code>.cpp</code> file extension), a programming language * [[Carte parallelogrammatique projection]], an equirectangular map projection * [[Casein phosphopeptide]], a chemical * [[Chinese postman problem]], a mathematical problem in graph theory * [[meta-Chlorophenylpiperazine]], a chemical * [[Coal preparation plant]], a processing facility for washing raw coal * [[Cognitive Process Profile (CPP)]], a psychometric tool for measuring a persons capacity to cope with complexity, uncertainty and ambiguity (fluid intelligence) * [[Concrete Pavement Preservation]] * 3-((Â±)2-carboxypiperazin-4yl)propyl-1-phosphate, a NMDA receptor blocker * [[Conditioned place preference]] * [[Controllable pitch propeller]], a special type of propeller ==Medicine== * [[Cell penetrating peptide]], are short polycationic sequences * [[Central precocious puberty]], a condition in which puberty begins abnormally early * [[Cerebral perfusion pressure]], a medical term relating to bloodflow to the brain * [[Certificate of pharmaceutical product]], a certificate which establishes the status of a pharmaceutical product * [[Chronic pelvic pain]], a medical condition ==Miscellaneous== * [[Canada Pension Plan]], a contributory, earnings-related social insurance program in Canada * [[Certified Protection Professional]], a security management designation * [[Capital Purchase Program]], a preferred stock and equity warrant purchase program in the US * ''[[Celebrity Paranormal Project]]'', an American reality TV show which aired in 2006 * [[Consistent pricing process]], any representation of "prices" of assets in a market * [[Counter promenade position]], a dance position * [[Cross platform promotion]], the effective utilization of all social media platforms {{disambig}}
